channel.title: How to make npcs move?
channel.description:
I have been trying to make my abby demons move, but what ever i do, they dont move, only when i attack them. Maybe there is something wrong in my code?
[code]spawn = 1615 3106 3929 0 3097 3944 3111 3927 2[/code]
Hope someone can tell me what is wrong so they finnaly move
Delicious

item.title: How to make npcs move?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok this is a little difficult if your a beginner heres a neat program i found that helps with it just put it on auto-walk and it will put it in for you

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs move?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

i Know, i did that, well, kinda, but they spawn there alright, i can fight and kill them, and they drop the stuff i added to let them drop it.
But they just wont move =[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 09:35:05 AM[/size][hr]Is there no one that can help me with this problem?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs move?
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

well best thing to do is just go onto ur game do ::npc (npcid) e.g urs is 1615 so do ::npc 1615 log out â€¦ go to autospawn.cfg go to bottom u shuld see like spawn = 1615 select all of it right click and cut den put it above [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] den save and compile shuld work soz i doing dis quik cos da mopar forums will go odd on me agen

Read full topic
